title: Mord...
body: Ah yeh so that thing is crazy stupid when he is fed i think his armour just needs to be lowered.

replies.body:
His armour? You mean his gray shield?
It's based on his max HP. Regardless, this is like saying any other fed toplane champion should lose their essential tools. Mordekaiser is already okay at best, don't touch him.
Just learn not to feed him.
